message: If you're coming to PyCon 2011 in Atlanta next week, check out the sprints page ( http://us.pycon.org/2011/sprints/projects/ ) to see all of the great stuff that's going on during the sprints and sign up to help out. There will be a good number of us at the Pinax sprint all week, so don't be shy!
@lukeman Will there be a dedicated sprint IRC channel or is the plan to coordinate on #pinax-dev? (For people who would be working remotely.)
